titleStmt.title: Gravestone of Russell George Roche and Elizabeth Mary Roche

support.p: This is a stone (possibly limestone) gravestone ( 76.8 cm 55.9 cm 7.7 cm ).

supportDesc.condition: Good condition, all text visible and legible, with a small amount of dirt and moss on the top

layoutDesc.layout: The text is carved onto the gravestone and is centred on the gravestone, taking up the entirety of the inscribed field. There is no border and the field has a simple rectangle shape with a rounded top.

handDesc.summary: The text varies in size, with the largest letters used for the names.
handDesc.handNote: The text is capitals for the names and lower case for the birth and death dates.

origin.origPlace: Churchyard of Holy Trinity Church, Penn

history.provenance: in situ in the Churchyard of Holy Trinity Church, Penn
Still in situ in the Vineyard (Plot number 39A) of the Churchyard of Holy Trinity Church, Penn, Buckinghamshire, England.

graphic.desc: Photograph of the gravestone of Russell George and Elizabeth Mary Roche by S. Blackmore 2020

div.p: Russel George Roche, born 26 October 1936, died 8 August 2012. Elizabeth Mary Roche, born 25 April 1931, died 20 July 2015.

This twenty-first century gravestone lists the names of two occupants, Russell George Roche and Elizabeth Mary Roche. This is a simple gravestone, with the only information given being names and dates of birth and death. The providing of specific dates does however allow us to accurately calculate the age of Russell as 75 and Elizabeth as 84. We are not explicitly told the relationship between the two, however the fact that they were husband and wife is a fair assumption. This grave is located in a separate section in the graveyard, labelled the Vineyard (plot number 39A), which contains mainly twenty-first century gravestones.
